Turberfield utilities guide 0.47.0

Turberfield Utility library

Contents   ::   1. Flexible logging  »

Turberfield is a framework for discrete event simulations and turn-based games.

The API may change as the project proceeds. At this early stage you should only use the latest release; it may not be compatible with previous versions.

If you’ve spotted a bug in Turberfield, please let me know so I can fix it. If you think Turberfield lacks a feature, you can help drive development by describing your Use Case.

In either event, please leave a message on the project’s issue tracker.
